PolicyType","name":"policyType","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"string","name":"policyName","type":"string"},{"internalType":"string","name":"policyDescription","type":"string"}],"name":"updatePolicy","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"@mpetersoCode55, @ShaneDuncan602, @TJ-Everett, @VoR0220","details":"This contract serves as the primary data facet for the Rules Engine. It is responsible for creating, updating,      retrieving, and managing policies and rules. It enforces role-based access control and ensures that only authorized      users can modify or retrieve data. The contract also supports policy cementing to prevent further modifications.","kind":"dev","methods":{"applyPolicy(address,uint256[])":{"details":"Ensures that only calling contract admins can apply policies and validates policy types.","params":{"contractAddress":"The address of the contract to apply policies to.","policyIds":"The IDs of the policies to apply."}},"cementPolicy(uint256)":{"params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy to cement."}},"closePolicy(uint256)":{"details":"This function ensures that only policy admins can close a policy and that the policy is not cemented.","params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy to close."}},"createPolicy(uint8,string,string)":{"details":"Generates a policy ID and initializes the policy with the specified type.","params":{"policyDescription":"A description of the policy.","policyName":"The name of the policy.","policyType":"The type of the policy (CLOSED_POLICY or OPEN_POLICY)."},"returns":{"_0":"uint256 The generated policy ID."}},"deletePolicy(uint256)":{"details":"Removes the policy and all associated rules, trackers, and foreign calls. Ensures the policy is not cemented.","params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy to delete."}},"disablePolicy(uint256)":{"details":"A policy will not be checked against if it is in a disabled state.","params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy to disable."}},"getAppliedPolicyIds(address)":{"params":{"contractAddress":"The address of the contract."},"returns":{"_0":"uint256[] An array of applied policy IDs."}},"getPolicy(uint256)":{"details":"Since `Policy` contains nested mappings, the data is broken into arrays for external return.","params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy."},"returns":{"callingFunctionIds":"The calling function IDs corresponding to each calling function.","callingFunctions":"The calling functions within the policy.","ruleIds":"The rule IDs corresponding to each calling function."}},"getPolicyMetadata(uint256)":{"params":{"_policyId":"The ID of the policy to retrieve metadata for."},"returns":{"_0":"PolicyMetadata The metadata of the policy."}},"isCementedPolicy(uint256)":{"params":{"_policyId":"The ID of the policy to check."},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if the policy is cemented, false otherwise."}},"isClosedPolicy(uint256)":{"params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy to check."},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if the policy is closed, false otherwise."}},"isDisabledPolicy(uint256)":{"params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy to check."},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if the policy is disabled, false otherwise."}},"openPolicy(uint256)":{"details":"This function ensures that only policy admins can open a policy and that the policy is not cemented.","params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy to open."}},"unapplyPolicy(address,uint256[])":{"details":"Ensures that only calling contract admins can unapply policies. Removes associations between the contract and the specified policies.","params":{"_contractAddress":"The address of the contract from which policies will be unapplied.","_policyIds":"The IDs of the policies to unapply."}},"updatePolicy(uint256,bytes4[],uint256[],uint256[][],uint8,string,string)":{"details":"Updates the policy type, calling functions, and associated rules.","params":{"callingFunctionIds":"The IDs of the calling functions.","callingFunctions":"The function signatures of the calling functions in the policy.","policyId":"The ID of the policy to update.","policyType":"The type of the policy (CLOSED_POLICY or OPEN_POLICY).","ruleIds":"A two-dimensional array of rule IDs associated with the policy."},"returns":{"_0":"policyId The updated policy ID."}}},"title":"Rules Engine Policy Facet","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"PolicyCreated(uint256)":{"notice":"Policy Events"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"applyPolicy(address,uint256[])":{"notice":"Applies policies to a specified contract."},"cementPolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Marks a policy as cemented, preventing further modifications."},"closePolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Closes a policy by changing its type to CLOSED_POLICY."},"createPolicy(uint8,string,string)":{"notice":"Creates a new policy and assigns a policy admin."},"deletePolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Deletes a policy from storage."},"disablePolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Marks a policy as disabled."},"getAppliedPolicyIds(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves the IDs of policies applied to a specific contract."},"getPolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Retrieves a policy from storage."},"getPolicyMetadata(uint256)":{"notice":"Retrieves the metadata of a policy."},"isCementedPolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Checks if a policy is cemented."},"isClosedPolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Checks if a policy is closed."},"isDisabledPolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Checks if a policy is disabled."},"openPolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Opens a policy by changing its type to OPEN_POLICY."},"unapplyPolicy(address,uint256[])":{"notice":"Unapplies policies from a specified contract."},"updatePolicy(uint256,bytes4[],uint256[],uint256[][],uint8,string,string)":{"notice":"Updates a policy in storage."}},"notice":"This contract is a critical component of the Rules Engine, enabling secure and flexible policy applyPolicy(address,uint256[]).details: Ensures that only calling contract admins can apply policies and validates policy types.

params.contractAddress: The address of the contract to apply policies to.
params.policyIds: The IDs of the policies to apply.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to cement.

closePolicy(uint256).details: This function ensures that only policy admins can close a policy and that the policy is not cemented.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to close.

createPolicy(uint8,string,string).details: Generates a policy ID and initializes the policy with the specified type.

params.policyType: The type of the policy (CLOSED_POLICY or OPEN_POLICY).

deletePolicy(uint256).details: Removes the policy and all associated rules, trackers, and foreign calls. Ensures the policy is not cemented.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to delete.

disablePolicy(uint256).details: A policy will not be checked against if it is in a disabled state.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to disable.

returns._0: uint256[] An array of applied policy IDs.

getPolicy(uint256).details: Since `Policy` contains nested mappings, the data is broken into arrays for external return.

returns.callingFunctionIds: The calling function IDs corresponding to each calling function.
returns.callingFunctions: The calling functions within the policy.
returns.ruleIds: The rule IDs corresponding to each calling function.

params._policyId: The ID of the policy to retrieve metadata for.

returns._0: PolicyMetadata The metadata of the policy.

params._policyId: The ID of the policy to check.

returns._0: bool True if the policy is cemented, false otherwise.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to check.

returns._0: bool True if the policy is closed, false otherwise.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to check.

returns._0: bool True if the policy is disabled, false otherwise.

openPolicy(uint256).details: This function ensures that only policy admins can open a policy and that the policy is not cemented.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to open.

unapplyPolicy(address,uint256[]).details: Ensures that only calling contract admins can unapply policies. Removes associations between the contract and the specified policies.

params._contractAddress: The address of the contract from which policies will be unapplied.
params._policyIds: The IDs of the policies to unapply.

updatePolicy(uint256,bytes4[],uint256[],.details: Updates the policy type, calling functions, and associated rules.

params.callingFunctionIds: The IDs of the calling functions.
params.callingFunctions: The function signatures of the calling functions in the policy.
params.policyId: The ID of the policy to update.
params.policyType: The type of the policy (CLOSED_POLICY or OPEN_POLICY).
params.ruleIds: A two-dimensional array of rule IDs associated with the policy.

applyPolicy(address,uint256[]).notice: Applies policies to a specified contract.

cementPolicy(uint256).notice: Marks a policy as cemented, preventing further modifications.

closePolicy(uint256).notice: Closes a policy by changing its type to CLOSED_POLICY.

createPolicy(uint8,string,string).notice: Creates a new policy and assigns a policy admin.

getAppliedPolicyIds(address).notice: Retrieves the IDs of policies applied to a specific contract.

getPolicyMetadata(uint256).notice: Retrieves the metadata of a policy.

isCementedPolicy(uint256).notice: Checks if a policy is cemented.

isClosedPolicy(uint256).notice: Checks if a policy is closed.

isDisabledPolicy(uint256).notice: Checks if a policy is disabled.

openPolicy(uint256).notice: Opens a policy by changing its type to OPEN_POLICY.

unapplyPolicy(address,uint256[]).notice: Unapplies policies from a specified contract.
